resources.string: This application is a companion app for Homebank. Homebank is a free accounting software for Linux, Macintosh and Windows copyright of Maxime Doyen. Homebank can be found on its official website.
The android companion app will only work with an homebank file, and not on its own.
Homebank is developed Maxime Doyen. Homebank Android Companion is developed by Hubert Ray
You can help by funding homebank development, or by rating the companion app on the store.
